mapper.delete: delete from car where cid in #{id}
mapper.select: select c.cid, c.plateNo, c.cplace, c.stage, c.company, d.dname as did, c.cload, c.fdjId, c.baoxianId, c.description, c.cname, u.name as createBy from car c join driver d on d.did=c.did join user u on u.id=c.createBy where cid=#{cid}
select c.cid, c.plateNo, c.cplace, c.stage, d.dname as did, c.cload, c.baoxianId, c.cname from car c join driver d on c.did=d.did limit #{skipCount} , #{pageSize}
mapper.insert:
